name: Alien Army
description:
In the year 2077 Aliens has invaded Earth. There is only Alien Army to save the world. And you are in charge over this army.

This is a simple and classic shooter. 

The controls:

- Move the soldiers with the arrow keys. (Alternative IJKL-keys)

- Shoot there gun with the (Q W E R T)- keys (see under the soldiers). 

- Buy new soldiers with Space Bar (Cost $ 100).

- Press escape to quit the game.

Good luck have fun
